Articles.Content:
When i load my game it stops loading when it say,  Verifying Expansion : Breaking Ground SquadExpansion/Serenity

Has anyone else encounter this issue and if so is there a solution 

Edited December 15, 2020 by Jim_Browning

Verifying Breaking Ground is the very last thing that happens before the game compiles, so if anything at all breaks (like an exception) then the game will freeze with that on the loading screen.

To find out why it’s failing, you’ll need to get the logs. You can find how to do that and what to do with them here:

Edited December 17, 2020 by jimmymcgoochie
